title: Smacks & Scuffles Pack 1
description: 500+ body impact sounds for game developers in SMACKS & SCUFFLES PACK 1
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Introducing SMACKS & SCUFFLES PACK 1 - a comprehensive collection of over 500 high-quality, gut-wrenching body impact sound effects. This pack is designed to bring your video games to life with the most realistic and visceral sounds of punches, smacks, kicks, and scuffles.


The pack is meticulously categorized into seven distinct categories to help you find the perfect sound for your game development needs:


Wound Hit: These sounds mimic the chilling effect of hitting an open wound, adding a layer of realism and intensity to your game scenes.

Snappy Hard: These sounds have an edgy attack, perfect for depicting hard-hitting impacts that leave your players on the edge of their seats.

Body Hit: This category includes typical body impact sounds, from soft thuds to hard smacks, ideal for any scene involving physical combat in your game.

Extra Hit: This category features a variety of miscellaneous body impact sounds, providing you with a wide range of options for unique and diverse game soundscapes.

Whoosh Hit: These sounds combine the impact of a hit with a soft whoosh, adding a dramatic flair to your game action sequences.

Quick Smack: These sounds are characterized by a short decay and quick attack, perfect for fast-paced action and high-intensity game scenes.

Scuffles and Body Movements: This category includes subtle and complex body contact and fleshy sounds, ideal for depicting struggles, fights, and close combat scenes in your game.

From hard-hitting punches to soft impacts and simple body movements, the SMACKS & SCUFFLES PACK 1 offers a wide range of sounds to suit all your game sound design needs. Whether youâ€™re working on a high-octane action game, a suspenseful thriller, or a dramatic fight scene, this pack has you covered. Experience the crunch, feel the impact, and bring your game scenes to life with SMACKS & SCUFFLES PACK 1.

Only the product image is CreatedWithAI
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

64 Wound Hit SFX

111 Snappy Hard Hit SFX

90 Body Hit SFX

26 Whoosh Hit SFX

65 Quick Smack SFX

105 Scuffles And Body Movements SFX

41 Extra Hit SFX


Number of Audio Waves: 502

Number of Audio Cues: 502

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5:03

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows:Yes

Mac: Yes

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Silence removed from all sounds to make them more responsive.
